creator: sdeuvarow@gmail.com
text:
jakarta-jmeter-r533330 -> 02-May-2007 13:40

1- New test
2- add a thread group
3- add a FTP sampler (A)
  3.1 set the get/put selection on PUT
4- add a FTP sampler (B)
  3.2 set the get/put selection on GET
5- click on sampler (A)
6- click on sampler (B) -> see that the selection change to PUT
This has been fixed - see r535285, which is being uploaded now.
creator: sebb@apache.org
